post:
Own Box is Powerful Boxes sister site that now offers affordable and reliable hosting services and here at VPS Board today to show off our KVM SSD VPS hosting packages located in North West Europe. All our VPS packages include FREE weekly backups, FREE Anti-DDoS Protection and built on KVM technology. You can also be in complete control your VPS from our Client Area giving you the ability to rebuild, reinstall, reboot your VPS at any time, as well as configure network settings, rDNS and access console with noVNC.

FEATURES
* FREE weekly backups included. 
* Reboot, Reinstall or configure VPS from our client area. 
* FREE Anti-DDoS Protection included & IPv6 Ready! 
* Over 8 differet Linux & Windows distributions to deploy.

* Instant Deployment * UK Support.


If you got any questions about any of our services, please do not hesitate to contact us
